topComments.author: Bretlea
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Isso √© incr√≠vel! Estive em Gatlinburg provavelmente 20 vezes e nunca vim aqui. T√£o feliz que meus filhos puderam experimentar isso. Muita divers√£o e atividades est√£o inclu√≠das. Foi 100,00 para 2 adultos e 1 crian√ßa e uma crian√ßa. H√° muitas atra√ß√µes pelas quais a maioria dos lugares cobraria extra, estou muito agradecido por n√£o ser uma delas! Ficamos aqui por 6 horas no total, ent√£o um dia inteiro de divers√£o!  (Original) This is amazing! I have been to Gatlinburg probably 20 times and have never came here. So glad my kids got to experience this. A lot of fun and activities are all included. It was 100.00 for 2 adults and 1 kid and a toddler. There a lot of attractions that most places would charge extra for, I am so thankful this isn‚Äôt one of them! We were here for 6 hours total, so a full day of fun!

topComments.author: Greg Walter
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Experi√™ncia muito legal. A fila era longa, mas andava bem. Arcade no andar de cima tinha uma boa variedade de jogos. Os funcion√°rios fizeram um bom trabalho e foram simp√°ticos. O custo foi alto, mas para ser justo eu sou bem mesquinho.  (Original) Really cool experience.  Line was long but it moved along well.  Arcade upstairs had a nice assortment of games.  The employees did a good job and were friendly.  The cost was high but to be fair I'm pretty stingy.

topComments.author: Seth York
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Verdadeiramente maravilhoso! Pudemos passar um dia inteiro aqui. Foi bom poder sair, almo√ßar e depois voltar. Havia muitas coisas para fazer e adorei que, quando voc√™ pagava pela entrada, voc√™ recebia de tudo. Eles n√£o estavam tentando aumentar suas vendas o tempo todo. Meus filhos, com idades entre 3 e 11 anos, adoraram.  (Original) Truly wonderful! We were able to spend an entire day here. It was nice to be able to leave, grab lunch and then come back. There were plenty of things to do and I loved that when you paid for entrance, you got it all. They weren‚Äôt trying to upsell you on stuff the entire time. My kids, ranging in ages from 3-11, all loved it.

topComments.author: Noel Boerger
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A parte inicial √© exatamente a mesma de Orlando. Foi uma experi√™ncia divertida. Acho que seria melhor com crian√ßas, fomos em casal. As coisas de movimento foram muito divertidas, mas se voc√™ ficar doente de movimento, eu n√£o recomendaria faz√™-las, especialmente a montanha-russa e o teatro 40. N√£o estava muito ocupado, tamb√©m fomos, acho que uma ter√ßa √† noite, no final da tarde. Certifique-se de usar t√™nis! Voc√™ n√£o pode fazer o curso de cordas sem eles! A etiqueta a laser foi provavelmente a minha parte favorita. Mas todos os jogos extras, como no fliperama e nas maravilhas, custam dinheiro extra. Eles s√£o a nossa cabine de fotos que custa extra, mas todas as coisas principais est√£o inclu√≠das. N√£o sei se voltaria novamente, a menos que tivesse filhos, mas foi uma experi√™ncia muito boa.  (Original) The beginning part is exactly the same as the one in Orlando. It was a fun experience. I think it would be better with kids, we went as a couple.  The motion things were really fun but if you get motion sick I wouldn‚Äôt recommend doing them especially the roller coaster and the 40 theater. It wasn‚Äôt very busy we also went on I think a Tuesday night late afternoon.  Make sure you wear sneakers! You cannot do the ropes course without them! The laser tag was probably my favorite part. But all of the extra games like in the arcade and throughout the wonderworks do you cost extra money. They are our photo booth set up that cost extra but all of the main things are included. I don‚Äôt know that I would go again unless I had kids but it was a really good experience.

topComments.author: Racheal Lagrange
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Lugar muito interessante! H√° muuuuitas coisas para fazer, mas as atra√ß√µes est√£o quase uma em cima da outra. Quase n√£o h√° espa√ßo para se movimentar em um dia agitado. Eu definitivamente voltarei, mas em um dia mais lento. Fomos na semana de A√ß√£o de Gra√ßas, ent√£o, naturalmente, tudo estava lotado. Eu gostaria que as atra√ß√µes fossem um pouco mais espalhadas, mas √© assim que √©. Compre seus ingressos online para n√£o ter que esperar na fila quando chegar l√°. Se voc√™ achar meu coment√°rio √∫til, por favor, d√™ um polegar para cima, obrigado!  (Original) Very interesting place! There‚Äôs soooo many things to do but the attractions are almost on top of each other. There‚Äôs hardly any space to move around on a busy day. I will definitely go back but on a slower day. We went the week of Thanksgiving so naturally everything was crowded. I wish the attractions were a little more spread out but it is was it is. Buy your tickets online so you don‚Äôt have to wait in line when you get there. If you find my review helpful, please give it a thumbs up, Thanks!

topComments.author: Sara Olivencia
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Fomos √†s 10h de uma quarta-feira e j√° estava lotado! Tivemos que esperar em uma fila para fazer qualquer coisa.  Parecia que havia muitas coisas divertidas para fazer, mas cansamos de esperar em tantas filas. Tamb√©m √© melhor para crian√ßas com mais de 42 polegadas.  Meu filho tem 5 anos e est√° na fronteira de 41-42. Eu estava com medo de ele fazer o curso de cordas sozinho. A fila para as cordas durou cerca de 45 minutos. A fila para laser tag tamb√©m durou 30 minutos. Algumas vezes eram mais longas que isso.  Eu s√≥ voltaria em um hor√°rio de folga.  (Original) We went at 10am on a Wednesday and it was already packed! We had to wait in a line to do anything.  It looked like there was lots of fun things to do, but we got tired of waiting in so many lines. It is also better for kids over 42 inches.  My son is 5 and right on the boarder line of 41-42. I was scared for him to do the ropes course alone. The line for the ropes was about 45 minutes long. The line for laser tag was also 30 minutes long. Some times were longer than that.  I would only go back during an off time.

topComments.author: c m
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Amamos o WonderWorks e vale a pena a taxa de entrada. Eles t√™m muitos cupons por a√≠ se voc√™ estiver preocupado com o custo, mas mesmo o pre√ßo total vale a pena. Tantas atividades cient√≠ficas pr√°ticas excelentes! Muito melhor do que um fliperama, mas as crian√ßas gostam tanto ou mais, e √© muito melhor para eles, √© claro. Grandes f√£s !!  (Original) We absolutely loved WonderWorks and it‚Äôs üíØ worth the entrance fee. They‚Äôve got lots of coupons floating around if you‚Äôre concerned about cost but even full price is worth it. So many great hands-on science activities! Way better than an arcade but kids like it just as much, or more, and it‚Äôs way better for them of course. Big fans!!

topComments.author: Kathryn Singleton
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar √© M√ÅGICO! Eu amei tudo sobre ele! √ìtimo lugar para festas de anivers√°rio de crian√ßas, uma atividade nas f√©rias e coisas assim. Apenas lembre-se de trazer t√™nis e n√£o sand√°lias porque eles n√£o v√£o deixar voc√™ nos passeios se voc√™ estiver usando sand√°lias, eu j√° cometi esse erro lol  (Original) This place is MAGICAL! I loved everything about it! Great place for kid birthday parties, an activity on vacation, and things like that. Just remember to bring sneakers not sandals because they won't let you on the rides if your wearing sandals, I already made that mistake lol

topComments.author: Kavitha Krishnan
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Realmente bom museu interativo de ci√™ncias para crian√ßas e adultos. Eles t√™m alguns passeios malucos e exposi√ß√µes divertidas. Voc√™ pode facilmente passar meio dia. O pre√ßo do bilhete vale a pena, h√° tantas coisas divertidas para fazer l√°!  (Original) Really good interactive science museum for kids and adults. They have few crazy rides and fun exhibits. You can easily spend half a day. The price of the ticket is worth it, there are so many fun things to do there!

topComments.author: Misty Payne
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Esta √© definitivamente uma obriga√ß√£o na sua lista enquanto estiver na √°rea. Muito divertido e n√£o tenha pressa quando for a este lugar. Minha filha e eu nos divertimos muito.  (Original) This is definitely a must on your list while in the area. So much fun and don't be in a rush when you go in this place. My daughter and I had a great time.

topComments.author: Michelle Atherton
topComments.comment: This is a must-visit activity! There are so many things to see and do at Wonderworks. Hands down my favorite activity during my family trip. Everything is included in admission except the arcade upstairs. Otherwise, the rides, 3D  adventure movie, and all other activities are included in the admission price. Fun for kids and adults!

topComments.author: Janie Brunson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Nosso grupo de 12 teve uma explos√£o! Este foi um dos maiores destaques da viagem, tanto quanto atra√ß√µes. Est√° cheio de paradas e atividades, MAS vale a pena. A entrada foi √≠ngreme, mas valeu a pena. As crian√ßas sa√≠ram cansadas e os pais at√© se divertiram muito. A equipe foi super amig√°vel, cumprimentou-nos a todos prontamente, e a √°rea era muito limpa. Deve fazer para todos os membros da fam√≠lia!  (Original) Our group of 12 had a blast! This was one of the biggest highlights of the trip as far as attractions. It is crammed tight full of stops and activities, BUT it‚Äôs worth it. Admission was steep, but well worth it. The kids left tired, and the parents even had a blast. Staff was super friendly, greeted us all promptly, and the area was very clean. Must do for all members of the family!

topComments.author: Andrea R.
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Fomos no final do dia, ent√£o n√£o h√° tempos de espera nas exposi√ß√µes. A equipe √© muito amig√°vel e prestativa. Divers√£o para toda a fam√≠lia. N√≥s definitivamente voltaremos no futuro.  (Original) We went towards end of day, so no wait times at exhibits. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Fun for the whole family. We will definitely return in the future.

topComments.author: Colin Strylowski
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Muito querido, sou um homem adulto e ainda n√£o queria ir embora no final, lembre-se de trazer t√™nis para poder usar todos os passeios. H√° uma lanchonete no final que √© surpreendentemente acess√≠vel, considerando que √© um p√∫blico cativo (j√° que eles n√£o cobram pre√ßos de cinema), ent√£o voc√™ n√£o precisa se preocupar muito em garantir que todos sejam alimentados antes de vir.  (Original) Pretty sweet, I'm a full grown man and I still didn't want to leave at the end, just remember to bring sneakers so you can use all the rides. There is a snack bar at the end that is shockingly affordable considering it's captive audience (as in they don't charge movie theater prices) so you don't have to worry too much about making sure everyone is fed before coming.

topComments.author: Donte Gordon
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Fale sobre a chance de uma vida! Minha fam√≠lia e eu nos divertimos muito! Quem n√£o gosta de aprender, volte a ser crian√ßa e esteja em um ambiente familiar saud√°vel ao mesmo tempo! WonderWorks Pigeon Forge √© o lugar principal para divers√£o e emo√ß√£o em fam√≠lia! Traga desinfetante e use sapatos de gin√°stica / exerc√≠cios confort√°veis!  (Original) Talk about a chance of a lifetime! My family and I had a BLAST! Who doesn't like to learn, be a kid again, and be in a wholesome family environment all at once! WonderWorks Pigeon Forge is the premier place to be for family fun and excitement! Bring sanitizer and wear comfortable gym/workout shoes!

topComments.author: Danielle Esmits
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Um dos meus lugares favoritos de todos os tempos! Amig√°vel para a fam√≠lia. Algo para todos. Super legal, n√£o importa sua idade ou interesse!  (Original) One of my favorite places ever! Family friendly. Something for everyone. Super cool no matter your age or interest!

topComments.author: Stella's Mom
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Nos divertimos muito aqui, com nossa viagem de programa para jovens. muitos jogos para interagir, voc√™ tamb√©m pode aprender ao mesmo tempo. Definitivamente voltarei aqui novamente, sempre que tiver a chance.  (Original) Had a lot of fun here, with our youth program trip. lots of games to interact with, you can also learn at the same time. l will definitely come back here again, whenever I get the chance.

topComments.author: John Fisher
topComments.comment: Exhibits were awesome. Some didn't work but it wasn't long before someone came and fixed them. The staff was absolutely awful. Alison in the laser tag section was ridiculously bad. She wouldn't repeat how to operate the gun and my mother (who has never played) didn't understand. She shoved my 5 year old out of the way so she could get to the front. She definitely needs to be retrained on customer service or fired. The attendants at the sky course were the laziest I have seen in awhile. They had multiple people in the staging area, multiple people in line, multiple people putting on harnesses and multiple people waiting to get off and they just stood around. At one point the manager came by to help but didn't put a dent in it. This place could be so much more if management made sure customers were treated correctly. The only guy that shined was the XR Theater. He was a littlenolder but man he sure did make my family feel welcomed. Thank you sir!

topComments.author: Christine Bargo
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Levei meu filho autista aqui e, embora hesitante no come√ßo, ele teve o BLAST. Os ingressos valem o pre√ßo com a quantidade de atra√ß√µes e valem o dia inteiro, ent√£o voc√™ pode sair e voltar desde que guarde seus ingressos. Um lugar amig√°vel para crian√ßas com coisas para todas as idades. O pre√ßo inclui etiqueta a laser.  (Original) Took my autistic son here and though hesitant at first he had BLAST. Tickets are worth the price with the amount of attractions and are good for the entire day, so you can leave and come back so long as you keep ahold of your tickets. A kid friendly place with things for all ages. Price includes laser tag.

topComments.author: Cody Schnakenburg
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Passamos o dia no WonderWorks e nos divertimos muito. Chegamos logo ap√≥s a abertura e foi ficando cada vez mais movimentado ao longo do dia, mas nunca esperamos mais do que cerca de 10 minutos por uma atividade. Dinheiro bem gasto e muito aprendizado para todas as idades. Tivemos crian√ßas de 4-11 e todos eles tiveram uma explos√£o !!  (Original) We spent the day at WonderWorks and had a great time. We arrived just after opening and it got progressively busy throughout the day but never waited more than about 10 minutes for an activity if at all.  Money well spent and lots of learning for all ages.  We had kids from 4-11 and they all had a blast!!
